DataSourcePortable.Name: Totalizador do evento R-2010
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT HANDLE, INFORMACAOBASETRIBUTO, CNPJPRESTADOR, VLRTOTALBASERET,
 CRTOM114106, SUM(VLRCRTOM114106) VLRCRTOM114106, SUM(VLRCRTOMSUSP114106) VLRCRTOMSUSP114106,
 CRTOM116201, SUM(VLRCRTOM116201) VLRCRTOM116201, SUM(VLRCRTOMSUSP116201) VLRCRTOMSUSP116201
FROM (
 SELECT A.HANDLE, A.INFORMACAOBASETRIBUTO, A.CNPJPRESTADOR, A.VLRTOTALBASERET,
 '114106' CRTOM114106, 0 VLRCRTOM114106, 0 VLRCRTOMSUSP114106,
 '116201' CRTOM116201, B.VLRCRTOM VLRCRTOM116201, B.VLRCRTOMSUSP VLRCRTOMSUSP116201
 FROM REINF_R5001TOTALIZADORR2010 A
 JOIN REINF_TOTALIZADORSERVICOTOMADO B ON B.TOTALIZADORR2010 = A.HANDLE
 WHERE B.CRTOM = '116201'
 UNION ALL
 SELECT A.HANDLE, A.INFORMACAOBASETRIBUTO, A.CNPJPRESTADOR, A.VLRTOTALBASERET,
 '114106' CRTOM114106, B.VLRCRTOM VLRCRTOM114106, B.VLRCRTOMSUSP VLRCRTOMSUSP114106,
 '116201' CRTOM116201, 0 VLRCRTOM116201, 0 VLRCRTOMSUSP116201
 FROM REINF_R5001TOTALIZADORR2010 A
 JOIN REINF_TOTALIZADORSERVICOTOMADO B ON B.TOTALIZADORR2010 = A.HANDLE
 WHERE B.CRTOM = '114106'
) TABELA
GROUP BY HANDLE, INFORMACAOBASETRIBUTO, CNPJPRESTADOR, VLRTOTALBASERET, CRTOM114106, CRTOM116201" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="INFORMACAOBASETRIBUTO" From="A" Path="INFORMACAOBASETRIBUTO" /> <Field Alias="CNPJPRESTADOR" From="A" Path="CNPJPRESTADOR" /> <Field Alias="VLRTOTALBASERET" From="A" Path="VLRTOTALBASERET" /> <Field Alias="CRTOM114106" From="A" Path="CRTOM114106" /> <Field Alias="VLRCRTOM114106" From="A" Path="VLRCRTOM114106" /> <Field Alias="VLRCRTOMSUSP114106" From="A" Path="VLRCRTOMSUSP114106" /> <Field Alias="CRTOM116201" From="A" Path="CRTOM116201" /> <Field Alias="VLRCRTOM116201" From="A" Path="VLRCRTOM116201" /> <Field Alias="VLRCRTOMSUSP116201" From="A" Path="VLRCRTOMSUSP116201" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
